title: please help i
body:
i've had to start lowering the chat bar down so i can't see it due to most teams having some toxic players in it i just want to play with people who are not toxic who want to improve have fun and play this game afterall this is a GAME its meant to be fun
anybody out there whow ants fun add me ranked or norm
